sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 29, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 14, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 9th quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $8.61, the dividend yield is 5.81%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $8.61, representing a -60.29% decrease from the 52 week high of $21.68 and a 5.64% increase over the 52 week low of $8.15.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.21.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as -2.9%, compared to an industry average of -1.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
